dtliExcerpt: If/Then is a show that wants desperately to be profound about the paths we choose and don't choose in life, but it's so busy being clever about its concept that it forgets to make us care about the woman at its center.
showScoreExcerpt: If/Then is a show that wants desperately to be profound about the paths we choose and don't choose in life, but it's so busy being clever about its concept that it forgets to make us care about the woman at its center.
